author: Simon Difford
description: This vintage cocktail is literally a thickened alcoholic milkshake flavoured with cognac and rum. Yum!
name: Egg Nog
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass
